query:
UPDATE initiatives SET
  problemStatement = 'Marketing creative team spends 8-10 hours weekly on basic image editing tasks (resizing, background removal, color correction, format conversion) for campaign assets across multiple channels. Outsourcing to design agencies costs $2,000-3,000 monthly. Turnaround time for simple edits is 24-48 hours, creating bottlenecks in campaign launches.',
  aiApproach = 'Deploy AI-powered image enhancement suite that automates routine editing tasks: intelligent background removal, one-click resizing for all platform specs, automatic color grading to match brand palette, smart cropping with focal point detection, and batch processing. Includes brand asset library integration and version control.',
  primaryUsers = 'Creative Services Team (2 people), Social Media Manager, Campaign Managers, Content Marketing Team',
  currentWorkflow = '1) Receive image editing requests via email (ongoing) 2) Manual editing in Photoshop (6 hrs/week) 3) Export multiple sizes and formats (2 hrs/week) 4) Upload to asset library (1 hr/week) 5) Revisions and adjustments (2 hrs/week). Total: 11 hours/week',
  proposedWorkflow = '1) Upload source images to AI platform (15 min) 2) AI automatically processes all variations (automated) 3) Quick review and approval (1 hr) 4) Auto-sync to brand asset library (automated). Total: 1.25 hours/week',
  bottlenecksAddressed = 'Eliminates manual editing bottleneck, reduces dependency on external agencies, enables same-day turnaround for image assets, frees creative team for strategic design work',
  quantifiedGoal = 'Reduce image editing time from 11 to 1.25 hours per week (89% reduction), eliminate $30K annual outsourcing costs, reduce turnaround time from 48 to 2 hours, increase creative team capacity for strategic projects by 40%',
  processOwner = 'Creative Services Manager',
  affectedTeams = '["Creative Services", "Social Media", "Campaign Management", "Content Marketing"]',
  primaryMetric = 'cost_reduction',
  baselineMeasurement = 'Current: 11 hours/week editing time, $30K annual outsourcing, 48-hour turnaround, 60% of creative time on routine tasks',
  successCriteria = '1.25 hours/week editing time, $0 outsourcing, 2-hour turnaround, 20% of creative time on routine tasks, 90% team satisfaction',
  measurementMethod = 'Time tracking, cost savings tracking, turnaround time monitoring, creative team capacity analysis, quarterly surveys',
  memberExperienceImpact = 'low',
  brandDifferentiation = 'low',
  operationalExcellence = 'medium',
  impactScale = 'team',
  impactBenefitType = 'Cost reduction, time savings, faster turnaround, increased creative capacity',
  impactFinancialReturn = 100000,
  feasibilityComplexity = 'low',
  feasibilityTimeline = '2-3 weeks',
  feasibilityDependencies = 'Brand guidelines documentation, integration with existing asset management system, training for creative team'
WHERE id = 5;
command:

  problemStatement = 'Marketing creative team spends 8-10 hours weekly on basic image editing tasks (resizing, background removal, color correction, format conversion) for campaign assets across multiple channels.
